title: Vi q bug (locked) [Gameplay]
body:
first off merry christmas,
secondly i was playing some Vi jungle earlier today and was horrified when my q stopped working, i could not cast it even after rebinding the cast key, exiting client etc etc (tried just about everything i could think off) i noticed it happened as i charged (with q) into a morgana binding.
i decided to have another game with her despite this and it happened again this time around the 25 minute mark with no real precursor or reason this time (i just recalled and it locked again after) after reading through forums it seems to be a recurring bug that is (usually) set off via launching with q into a knockup snare stun binding (any from of hard cc) and the spell locks after that.
i just wanted to report this bug, sorry i have no footage to accompany this i dont record my games however i was able to reproduce the bug in a bots game shortly after realising it wasnt a one off, please fix asap i miss my Vi ;)
thanks in advance

replies.body:
So odd, I have played over 200 ranked games as vi this season, and I have never encountered this issue.

The fact that it has happened to you twice in one day is of concern. Any bugs on vi I like to see fixed though haha. just so I never have to encounter the issue when I an in an important situation.
it has only happened as of the latest patch never had a problem before that but like i said i can recreate the bug rather easily so is worth noting
